description: This Java source file defines a class DummyAdapter that implements the IntegrationAdapter interface. It serves as a placeholder/scaffolding adapter for integration purposes, providing methods to connect, disconnect, and synchronize, with logging statements.

classes.name: DummyAdapter
classes.description: A placeholder adapter implementation for integration, providing connect, disconnect, and sync functionalities with logging.

methods.name: getKey
methods.description: Returns the string identifier 'dummy' for this adapter.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Initializes the adapter with provided configuration JSON and logs the connection.

methods.name: sync
methods.description: Performs a dummy synchronization task, logging the event.
